alert.note: Alert for Aibonito; Coamo; Juana Diaz; Salinas; Santa Isabel; Villalba (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 21 at 10:51PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM AST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Aibonito, Coamo, Juana Diaz, Salinas, Santa Isabel and Villalba. * WHEN...Until 1245 AM AST. * IMPACTS...Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 951 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Aibonito; Coamo; Juana Diaz; Salinas; Santa Isabel; Villalba
